title: FS Group of 4 John McGraw / polo grounds PC's
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: FS Group of 4 John McGraw / polo grounds PC's
posts.post_content: Group of 4 two have been posted one in 1914 the other in 1916. 2 unused one dates from about 1915 the other the mid 1920's. All are different. Asking $50 for the group.
